metadata.requirements:
Project: "SimpleTask" To-Do App

Tech: FastAPI (Python) backend + Vanilla HTML/CSS/JS frontend.

Database: None. Use an in-memory list on the backend.

Backend:

Serve the HTML/CSS/JS files.

Provide JSON API for:

GET /api/tasks (Get all tasks)

POST /api/tasks (Create a new task)

PUT /api/tasks/{id} (Mark task as complete)

DELETE /api/tasks/{id} (Delete a task)

Frontend:

On load: Fetch and display all tasks from the API.

Input field + "Add" button to create a new task (POST to API).

"Complete" button on each task (PUT to API).

"Delete" button on each task (DELETE to API).

List must update instantly after add, complete, or delete (no page reload).

Completed tasks should be visually marked (e.g., line-through).
